raw_answer: 解:∵BC是⊙O的切线,则∠ABC=90°,由勾股定理得,AC=10,AB为⊙O的直径,则∠ADB=90°,∴S~△ABC~=\frac{1}{2}AB•BC=\frac{1}{2}AC•BD,∴BD=4.8．故选:B．
